
                            
                            <p>就比如我，京东外卖 （京东搜【外卖优惠500】参加优惠）没出来之前，基本不在<a href="http://dpurl.cn/1g5fIXcz" target="_blank" class="infotextkey">美团</a>和<a href="https://u.ele.me/dCApc6N5" target="_blank" class="infotextkey">饿了么</a>点外卖，除非饿了么有免单才点，自从京东外卖 （京东搜【外卖优惠500】参加优惠）出来之后，3个账号天天点益禾堂的果茶 <br>  <br> 昨天京东点了新疆炒米粉，用了15-10还要20多，我昨天自提的 <br>  <br> 我在店里看&nbsp;&nbsp;芹菜素炒才15加馕才4块钱&nbsp;&nbsp;一共才19 <br>  <br> 商家一本万利啊，全是东哥补贴出来的 <br>  <br> 益禾堂是真便宜 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/21/155359swdaiskd9si9cys7.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/21/155359swdaiskd9si9cys7.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/21/155553b4zuzcyx4wx95wlp.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/21/155553b4zuzcyx4wx95wlp.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">像这种肠粉，炒粉都是价格虚高的。建议避开</p><p></p>
